item.title: Meditating on Mortality
item.description: Hey, I hope you are all in good health in these interesting times. As we quarantine ourselves from the world, we find more times for ourselves. More time to sleep, and binge on content. In the biggest pandemic of our century, we have the comfort of internet. Whether that may be TV, movies, books, Instagram, or of course Twitter. I have been guilty of the binge. Many a times I found myself frustrated, brain-dead.

item.title: Setting Up Hugo
item.description: This is my second time setting up Hugo, my first impression is: the documentation is really not good. I was mostly able to setup using the instructions in this tutorial
